Summary: Strange lights in the SE sky
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Halifax
There were no other sightings in Halifax on or around November 30th 2002
divs: sighting detailsi stepped out onto my deck, which faces south (towards halifax), at approximately 5:20 monday morning, november 3rd, 2008. while smoking my cigarette, i noticed two very bright white lights, stacked vertically, in the se quadrant of the sky, moving towards the ne. as they appeared to get closer, it was apparent that they were moving very quickly. what struck me as unusual was the time, and the liklihood that two aircraft would be be flying in a vertical formation at this time. also noticed were a number (approx 4-5) of fainter, red lights of the approximate same size, to the left and right of the two white lights, which seemed to lead\follow the white, brighter lights through the early morning sky. there was no audible noise, but they all seemed to move in a coordinated fashion towards the east. from where i live, i would estimate that these objects were in the sky somewhere east of halifax international airport, and possibly closer to the eastern shore (i.e. musquodoboit harbor\martinique)
